title: Unspecified error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
body:
I'm using a Mac Book Pro on OSX 10.9.5

When directly opening the patcher app I keep getting an 'Update failed' message, "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." with the option to 'Continue' or 'Send Logs'

I'm pretty sure there isn't a patch I'm updating for..  

The progress bar get stuck on, Calculating Differences | 1 Files Scanned.

The patcher can also crash with no Update Failed message.

I managed to get through once, when i changed my WiFi connection. The problem started on my iinet, I changed to TPG where LoL worked fine (much better ping too!) until this morning..

EDIT:

**Fix attempts**

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/8b0EJ8nP-mac-wont-open-dec-3-2014-fix FAILED

Repair Attempt FAILED (crashed during repair)

http://puu.sh/ehAMr/61ce5b47f6.png WORKING (with Mac Open Network Preferences > Advanced > DNS > Click the Plus below the left box add 8.8.4.4, click the plus below the right box, hit 8.8.8.8 )

replies.body: WOW.... That worked perfectly!! Thank you!
The trouble started on iinet then I took the laptop to my girlfirends, who has TPG.  It worked for a day, and now this.. :/
